summary: Encapsulates a LIFX smart bulb, exposing its current attributes (brightness, color temperature, hue‑saturation, IP address, power state, name, supported capabilities) and providing operations to modify those attributes such as turning the light on/off, adjusting color, renaming, and setting power levels.
business_intent: Allow home‑automation or IoT applications to monitor and control LIFX lighting devices through a unified object interface.
